Message:
My head hurts so much
it feels like it’ll split.

It’s like all the knowledge held
in the seed is spreading out
before me like an infinite sea.

If all that information pours
into a small human mind...

Well, of course it’d break you...
I really did try my best...
But, I guess it is
impossible after all...

This may be how it ends,
but at least I got to have
a bit of fun before I go.
I don’t regret a thing...

Of course...that’s not true...
I hate this...

I don’t want to die...
Please,
save me...Serruria...!
“Meria!!”

...! Serruria...
You really came to save me...?

“As punishment,
I’ll have you sort 100,000
pollen spores out by hand,
so you better get ready!”

Whaaat...?
That’d be a real pain...

Shocked back to my senses,
my consciousness lifts,
floating above the sea
of flowing knowledge.

Serruria never ceases
to impress me...
I can’t waste the chance
she’s given me!

The foundation of the world.
Angels and demons.

The blueprint for a new “tree”
made of 22 branches...

With this knowledge
at your fingertips,
you could even become a god...

But, I’ll destroy
every last trace of it.

Like water spiraling down a drain,
the truths of this world
began to disappear.

When I finally opened my eyes,
I did my best to put on
my biggest smile for
the girl crouching before me,
who looked to be
on the verge of tears.
“At least make it...10,000...”
100,000’s way too much...
